summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1879, for the improvement of Thorndyke Avenue, from West Howe Street to West Hayes Street, and from West Hayes Street to West Galer Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, and making all connections to the existing improvements, under Ordinance No. 19547 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
